com.analog.lyric.dimple.model.domains

Class JointDomainReindexer.Indices

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.analog.lyric.dimple.model.domains.JointDomainReindexer.Indices
  • Enclosing class:
    JointDomainReindexer

    @NotThreadSafe
public static class JointDomainReindexer.Indices
extends java.lang.Object
    A set of domain indexes sized appropriately for a single converter for use in conversion computation.
    See Also:
    JointDomainReindexer.getScratch(), JointDomainReindexer.convertIndices(Indices)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int[] addedIndices 
      JointDomainReindexer converter 
      int[] fromIndices 
      int[] joinedIndices 
      int[] removedIndices 
      int[] toIndices 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int readIndices(java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger removedJointIndexRef)
      Returns joint index computed from #toIndices and if removedJointIndexRef is non-null and #converter has non-null for JointDomainReindexer.getRemovedDomains(), this will compute a joint index from #removedIndices and set it in that removedJointIndexRef.
      void release()
      Release object back to its converter so that it may be reused.
      void writeIndices(int fromJointIndex, int addedJointIndex)
      Fills in fromIndices from fromJointIndex and addedIndices from addedJointIndex.

    • Method Detail

      • writeIndices

        public void writeIndices(int fromJointIndex,
                int addedJointIndex)
        Fills in fromIndices from fromJointIndex and addedIndices from addedJointIndex. If #converter has null for JointDomainReindexer.getAddedDomains(), then addedJointIndex will be ignored.

      • readIndices

        public int readIndices(@Nullable
              java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger removedJointIndexRef)
        Returns joint index computed from #toIndices and if removedJointIndexRef is non-null and #converter has non-null for JointDomainReindexer.getRemovedDomains(), this will compute a joint index from #removedIndices and set it in that removedJointIndexRef. Returns -1 if #toIndices contains negative value.

      • release

        public final void release()
        Release object back to its converter so that it may be reused. The caller must not use the object after calling this method.
